EmailTemplate.name: Bus Service Issue - Buses 1,5 & 6
EmailTemplate.subject: Bus Services Issue - Buses 1, 5 & 6
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear BSN Parents,
I am writing to you today about a small matter concerning Buses 1, 5 & 6.
Bus 1 met unusual traffic conditions while in transit to pick-up students living at Masterland. – as I am writing this, Bus 1 is still on the highway (8:10am).
Due to this our Bus & Services manager, Mrs Fiona Gao, was promptly contacted by the driver of Bus 1 and she has diverted Bus 5 to pick-up Masterland studnets.
Bus 6 has been diverted to pick-up Yulan Villas & Bamboo Garden students.
We wanted to take a moment to write to parents who have students on these buses to explain why you may have seen or heard about a different BSN bus picking-up your child(ren).
If you have further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me at your leisure.
Warm Regards,
Joshua Maddox Administration Director The British School of Nanjing Tel: +86 (25) 5210 8987 Fax: +86 (25) 5210 2385 www.bsn.org.cn Part of The British Schools Foundation – World Class Education
